item.title: Bangladesh bars SpiceJet from overflying airspace on pending dues. [ economictimes ]
item.description:
[Priority]

Systemic Significance

Selected by: Mistral-Small, Qwen-3-32B, GPT-OSS-120B

Bangladesh has banned SpiceJet from using its airspace due to unpaid air navigation charges, forcing the airline to take longer routes and increasing fuel costs. The budget carrier, facing financial struggles despite recent fundraising, is in communication with Bangladeshi authorities to resolve the issue and resume normal operations.
